name: obis
description: A JavaScript framework for downloading bank statements
author: Conan Theobald

scripts.debug: pnpm run build:clean ; cross-env NODE_ENV=local HYDRATE=yes nodemon -e js,jsx,json,scss node build.js --mock-server
scripts.debug:live: pnpm run build:clean ; cross-env NODE_ENV=local HYDRATE=no nodemon -e js,jsx,json,scss node build.js --mock-server
scripts.build:clean: rimraf dist/bookmarklet; rimraf dist/extension; mkdir -p dist/bookmarklet/plugins; mkdir -p dist/extension/images; cp -R extension-bootstrap/images/icon-*.png dist/extension/images
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:clean ; cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm run build
